content:
****************** Text below copyright 2022 Broadcom, Inc. ******************
RCS5043  CA REMOTE CONSOLE SCHEDULER ROUTINE ABEND code

     Explanation: A STAE or ESTAE routine within CA REMOTE Console received
     control due to an abend. The abend is shown in code. This can occur if
     a command is being issued, or may represent an abend in another
     product processing the command. CA REMOTE Console's STAE or ESTAE
     routine performs recovery processing.

     Action: Try to verify that the abend is not actually in another
     product. Then gather the appropriate diagnostic information (dumps,
     system logs, and supporting data) and contact Computer Associates
     Technical Support for help.
